alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 12:15PM MST until March 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snow may be heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...In Kansas, Cheyenne County. In Colorado, Yuma and Kit Carson Counties. In Nebraska, Dundy and Hitchcock Counties. * WHEN...Now through 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and snowpacked road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility will be reduced to one half to one mile and when combined with the snowpacked roadways cause further driving difficulties.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
